<DESCRIPTION>INSTRUMENT OF RESIGNATION, APPOINTMENT AND ACCEPTANCE, DATED JANUARY 31, 2005
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Instrument of Resignation, Appointment and Acceptance, dated January 31, 2005</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.4 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>EXECUTION COPY </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">INSTRUMENT OF RESIGNATION, APPOINTMENT AND ACCEPTANCE, dated as of January&nbsp;31, 2005, by and among TOMMY HILFIGER U.S.A., INC., a corporation duly
organized and existing under the laws of the State of Delaware, having its principal office at 25 West 39</FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1" COLOR="#000000"><SUP>th</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000"> Street,
New York, New York 10018 (the &#147;<B><I>Issuer</I></B>&#148;), JPMORGAN CHASE BANK, N.A. (formerly known as JPMorgan Chase Bank, as successor to The Chase Manhattan Bank), a national banking association, having its corporate trust office at 4 New
York Plaza, 15</FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1" COLOR="#000000"><SUP>th</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000"> Floor, New York, New York 10004, as resigning Trustee (the &#147;<B><I>Resigning
Trustee</I></B>&#148;), and Wilmington Trust Company, a corporation duly organized and existing under the laws of the State of Delaware, having its principal corporate trust office at Rodney Square North, 1100 North Market Street, Wilmington,
Delaware 19890, as successor Trustee (the &#147;<B><I>Successor Trustee</I></B>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>RECITALS </U></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, there
was originally authorized and issued $200,000,000 aggregate principal amount of the Issuer&#146;s 6.85% Senior Bonds due 2008 (the &#147;<B><I>2008 Bonds</I></B>&#148;) pursuant to an Officers&#146; Certificate of the Issuer dated as of May&nbsp;8,
1998 (the &#147;<B><I>1998 Officers&#146; Certificate</I></B>&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, there was originally authorized and issued $150,000,000 aggregate principal amount of the Issuer&#146;s 9% Senior Bonds due 2031 (the &#147;<B><I>2031 Bonds</I></B>&#148; and together with the 2008 Bonds, the
&#147;<B><I>Securities</I></B>&#148;) pursuant to an Officers&#146; Certificate of the Issuer dated as of December&nbsp;3, 2001 (the &#147;<B><I>2001 Officers&#146; Certificate</I></B>&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the terms and conditions of the 2008 Bonds and the 2031 Bonds are
governed by that certain Indenture, dated as of May&nbsp;1, 1998 (as supplemented, the &#147;<B><I>Indenture</I></B>&#148;), between the Issuer, Tommy Hilfiger Corporation, as Guarantor and the Resigning Trustee, as such terms and conditions have
been supplemented by the 2008 Officers&#146; Certificate and the 2001 Officers&#146; Certificate, respectively; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Resigning Trustee wishes to resign as Trustee, the office or agency where the Securities may be surrendered for registration of transfer or
exchange (the &#147;<B><I>Registrar</I></B>&#148;), the office or agency where the Securities may be presented or surrendered for payment (the &#147;<B><I>Paying Agent</I></B>&#148;) and the office or agency where notices and demands to or upon the
Issuer in respect of the Securities and the Indenture may be served (the &#147;<B><I>Agent</I></B>&#148;) for all the Securities under the Indenture; the Issuer wishes to appoint the Successor Trustee to succeed the Resigning Trustee as Trustee,
Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture; and the Successor Trustee wishes to accept appointment as Trustee, Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants and promises herein,
the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Resigning Trustee and the Successor Trustee agree as follows: </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ARTICLE ONE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE RESIGNING TRUSTEE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;101</U>. Pursuant to Section&nbsp;610 of the Indenture, the Resigning Trustee hereby notifies the Issuer that the Resigning Trustee is hereby resigning as Trustee for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;102</U>. The Resigning Trustee hereby represents and warrants
to the Successor Trustee that: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) No
covenant or condition contained in the Indenture has been waived by the Resigning Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) There is no action, suit or proceeding pending or, to the best of the knowledge of the Responsible Officers of the Resigning Trustee
assigned to its corporate trust department, threatened against the Resigning Trustee before any court or governmental authority arising out of any action or omission by the Resigning Trustee as Trustee under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) This Instrument has been duly authorized, executed and
delivered on behalf of the Resigning Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(d) $192,470,000 aggregate principal amount of the 2008 Bonds is presently outstanding and $150,000,000 aggregate principal amount of the 2031 Bonds is presently outstanding. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e) Interest on the 2008 Bonds has been paid through December&nbsp;1, 2004 and interest on the 2031 Bonds
has been paid through December&nbsp;1, 2004. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(f) The Resigning Trustee has made, or promptly will make, available to the Successor Trustee originals, if available, or copies in its possession, of all documents relating to the trusts created by the Indenture (the
&#147;<B><I>Trusts</I></B>&#148;) and all information in the possession of its corporate trust department relating to the administration and status of the Trusts, including, without limitation, a certified list of the current registered holders of
the Securities (the &#147;<B><I>Certified Holders List</I></B>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(g) As of the date hereof, no notice of any defaults has been mailed by the Resigning Trustee to Holders pursuant to Section&nbsp;602 of the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;103</U>. The Resigning Trustee hereby assigns, transfers, delivers and confirms to the Successor Trustee all
right, title and interest of the Resigning Trustee in and to the trust under the Indenture, all the rights, powers, trusts and duties of the Trustee under the Indenture and all property and money held by such Resigning Trustee under the Indenture.
The Resigning Trustee shall execute and deliver such further instruments and shall do such other things as the Successor Trustee may reasonably require so as to more fully and certainly vest and confirm in the Successor Trustee all the rights,
powers, trusts and duties hereby assigned, transferred, delivered and confirmed to the Successor Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;104</U>. The Resigning Trustee hereby resigns as Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;105</U>. The Resigning Trustee agrees to pay or indemnify the Successor Trustee and save
the Successor Trustee harmless from and against any and all costs, claims, liabilities, losses or damages whatsoever (including the reasonable fees, expenses and disbursements of the Successor Trustee&#146;s counsel and other advisors), that the
Successor Trustee suffers or incurs without gross negligence or bad faith on its part arising out of actions or omissions of the Resigning Trustee. The Successor Trustee will furnish to the Resigning Trustee, promptly after receipt, all papers with
respect to any action the outcome of which would make operative the indemnity provided for in this Section. The Successor Trustee shall notify the Resigning Trustee promptly in writing (and, in any event, within no later than 10 days) of any claim
for which it may seek indemnity. The Resigning Trustee shall have the option to defend the claim and the Successor Trustee shall cooperate fully in the defense. If the Resigning Trustee shall assume the defense, then the Resigning Trustee shall not
pay for separate counsel of the Successor Trustee. The Resigning Trustee shall not be obligated to pay for any settlement made without its consent. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ARTICLE TWO </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"
ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE ISSUER </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;201</U>. The Issuer hereby certifies that annexed hereto marked <U>Exhibit A</U> is a copy of resolutions duly adopted by the Board of Directors of the Issuer, which resolutions are in full force and effect on the date
hereof, authorizing certain officers of the Issuer to: (a)&nbsp;accept the Resigning Trustee&#146;s resignation as Trustee, Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture; (b)&nbsp;appoint the Successor Trustee as
Trustee, Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all of the Securities under the Indenture; and (c)&nbsp;execute and deliver such agreements and other instruments as may be necessary or desirable to effectuate the succession of the Successor Trustee
as Trustee, Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;202</U>. The Issuer hereby accepts the resignation of the Resigning Trustee as Trustee, Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture. Pursuant to Section&nbsp;610 of the
Indenture, the Issuer hereby appoints the Successor Trustee as Trustee for all of the Securities under the Indenture and confirms to the Successor Trustee all the rights, powers, trusts and duties of the Trustee under the Indenture and with respect
to all property and money held or to be held under the Indenture. The Issuer shall execute and deliver such further instruments and shall do such other things as the Successor Trustee may reasonably require so as to more fully and certainly vest and
confirm in the Successor Trustee all the rights, powers, trusts and duties hereby assigned, transferred, delivered and confirmed to the Successor Trustee. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;203</U>. The Issuer hereby represents and warrants to the Successor Trustee that: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) It is a corporation duly and validly organized and
existing pursuant to the laws of the State of Delaware. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) The Indenture was validly and lawfully executed and delivered by the Issuer, has not been amended or modified, and is in full force and effect. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) The Securities are validly issued securities of the Issuer. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) No Event of Default under Section&nbsp;501 of the
Indenture has occurred and is continuing. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(e)
No covenant or condition contained in the Indenture has been waived by the Issuer or by the Holders of the percentage in aggregate principal amount of the Securities required to effect any such waiver. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(f) There is no action, suit or proceeding pending or, to
the best of the Issuer&#146;s knowledge, threatened against the Issuer before any court or any governmental authority arising out of any action or omission by the Issuer under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(g) This Instrument has been duly authorized, executed and
delivered on behalf of the Issuer. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(h) All
conditions precedent relating to the appointment of Wilmington Trust Company as successor Trustee, Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture have been complied with by the Issuer. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) As of the date hereof, the most recent quarterly
financial information furnished by the Guarantor pursuant to Section&nbsp;704 of the Indenture to the Resigning Trustee and filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission is with respect to the quarter ended June&nbsp;30, 2004. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;204</U>. The Issuer hereby appoints the Successor Trustee as
Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ARTICLE THREE </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">THE SUCCESSOR TRUSTEE
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;301</U>. The Successor Trustee hereby
represents and warrants to the Resigning Trustee and to the Issuer that the Successor Trustee is qualified and eligible under Section&nbsp;609 of the Indenture to act as Trustee for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;302</U>. Pursuant to Section&nbsp;611 of the Indenture, the
Successor Trustee hereby accepts its appointment as Trustee for all the Securities under the Indenture and shall hereby be vested with all the rights, powers, trusts and duties of the Trustee under the Indenture and with respect to all property and
money held or to be held under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;303</U>. The Successor Trustee hereby accepts its appointment as Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;304</U>. Promptly after the execution and delivery of this Instrument, the Successor Trustee, on behalf of
the Issuer, shall cause a notice, the form of which are annexed hereto marked <U>Exhibit B</U>, to be sent to each Holder of the Securities in accordance with Section&nbsp;610 of the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">ARTICLE FOUR </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">MISCELLANEOUS </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;401</U>. Except as otherwise expressly provided or unless the context otherwise requires, all terms used herein which are defined in the Indenture shall have the meanings assigned to them in the Indenture. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;402</U>. The resignation of the Resigning Trustee and the
appointment of the Successor Trustee as Registrar, Paying Agent and Agent for all the Securities under the Indenture shall be effective upon the latest of: (a)&nbsp;10 business days after the date first above written, (b)&nbsp;the second business
day following receipt by the Successor Trustee of the certified Holders list, and (c)&nbsp;receipt by The Depository Trust Company of both the Resigning Trustee&#146;s transfer agency change notice and the Successor Trustee&#146;s transfer agency
change notice. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;403</U>. Notwithstanding the
resignation of the Resigning Trustee effected hereby, the Issuer shall remain obligated under Section&nbsp;607 of Indenture to compensate, reimburse and indemnify the Resigning Trustee in connection with its prior trusteeship under the Indenture.
The Issuer also acknowledges and reaffirms its obligations to the Successor Trustee, including payments to be made in accordance with the fee schedule attached hereto as <U>Exhibit C</U>, as set forth in Section&nbsp;607 of the Indenture, which
obligations shall survive the execution hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;404</U>. This Instrument shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction which govern the Indenture and its construction. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;405</U>. This Instrument may be executed in any number of counterparts each of which shall be an original,
but such counterparts shall together constitute but one and the same instrument. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Section&nbsp;406</U> All notices, whether faxed or mailed, will be deemed received when sent pursuant to the following instructions: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">TO THE RESIGNING TRUSTEE: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">JPMorgan Chase Bank, N.A. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 New York Plaza, 15</FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="1" COLOR="#000000"><SUP>th</SUP></FONT><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000"> Floor </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">New York, New York 10004 </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Attention: Institutional Trust Services </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Tel.: (212)&nbsp;623-6759 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:13%; text-indent:4%"><FONT

<DESCRIPTION>AMENDMENT NO. 3 TO THE THUSA SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Amendment No. 3 to the THUSA Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.12 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>AMENDMENT NO. 3 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>TO THE TOMMY HILFIGER U.S.A., INC. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SUPPLEMENTAL EXECUTIVE RETIREMENT PLAN </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(Amended and Restated as of January&nbsp;1, 2003) </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS,</B> Tommy Hilfiger U.S.A., Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) maintains the Tommy Hilfiger U.S.A., Inc. Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan
(the &#147;Plan&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS,</B> the Plan is
subject to the nonqualified deferred compensation plan requirements of the American Jobs Creation Act of 2004 (the &#147;AJCA&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, by resolution dated October&nbsp;31, 2005, in order to comply with the requirements of the AJCA, the Company froze the Plan, all future
accruals of benefits ceased, and all future salary increases for purposes of the benefit formula disregarded, effective December&nbsp;31, 2004; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, all Participants in the Plan were earned and vested in their benefits effective as of December&nbsp;31, 2004, with the exception of the
Chief Executive Officer whose benefit is subject to the AJCA; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, pursuant to Sections 6.1 and 6.3 of the Plan, the Company may wholly or partially amend or otherwise modify the Plan at any time; provided no such amendment shall impair any rights to a Participant&#146;s vested Accrued
Benefit; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the Company authorized and
ratified the following amendments to the Plan to effectuate the foregoing. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:8%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOW THEREFORE</B>, it is hereby: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>The first paragraph of the Foreword of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following new sentence at the end thereof: </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;The Plan was frozen, all future accruals of benefits ceased, and all
future salary increases for purposes of the benefit formula disregarded, effective as of December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Section&nbsp;1.2 of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following new sentence at the end thereof: </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;Base Salary shall not include a Participant&#146;s annual rate of base
pay earned after December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Section&nbsp;1.7 of the Plan is hereby amended to add the following new sentence at the end thereof: </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;Notwithstanding the foregoing, effective December&nbsp;31, 2004, the
average of a Participant&#146;s Base Salary shall be determined for the last three full years of employment (or actual years of employment if less) as if the Participant terminated employment on December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#148; </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<B>Years of Service&#148;</B> shall mean a Participant&#146;s full
calendar years of service with the Company after March&nbsp;27, 1989 through no later than December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

Participants in the Plan.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

benefit accruals ceased and all future salary increases disregarded in determining a Participant&#146;s Accrued Benefit under this Section&nbsp;3.1, effective as of December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#148; </FONT></P> <P

<DESCRIPTION>LETTER AGREEMENT BY AND BETWEEN THEO KILLION AND THUSA, DATED MARCH 26, 2004
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Letter Agreement by and between Theo Killion and THUSA, dated March 26, 2004</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.27 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">March&nbsp;26, 2004 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Mr.&nbsp;Theo Killion </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">50 North Cassingham Road </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Bexley, Ohio 43209 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Dear Theo: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">I am pleased to offer you
employment with Tommy Hilfiger U.S.A., Inc., (the &#147;Company&#148; or &#147;THUSA&#148;) as Executive Vice President Human Resources. The following details the terms of our agreement: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Your employment with the Company shall begin on March&nbsp;30, 2004. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Your salary will be paid at the rate of $475,000.00 annually in accordance with the Company&#146;s then current payroll practices and subject to annual increases not to exceed the
average increase of salaried employees for THUSA. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Your bonus will be a 75% target based on Board approved financial goals of Tommy Hilfiger Corporation (&#147;THC&#148;). Your bonus will be capped at 200% of target.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You will be granted 100,000 options on March&nbsp;30, 2004 and 50,000 options on March&nbsp;31, 2005. Such options will be granted pursuant to the terms of the THC 2003 Incentive
Compensation Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;). Such options will have an exercise price equal to the fair market value on the grant date. Vesting for each grant will be 25%, 25% and 50%, respectively, on each of the first three anniversaries of the grant
date for each grant. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">On March&nbsp;30, 2004, you will receive a signing bonus of $175,000. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You will be reimbursed for all usual and customary moving and relocation expenses, including up to 120 days of temporary housing. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You will receive all benefits associated with those in a similar executive capacity as provided by the Company in accordance with their terms as they may be modified by the Company
from time to time. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the event you are terminated without Cause (as defined in the Plan) or there is a Change in Control (as defined in the Plan) of THC, and if you execute a release and separation
agreement satisfactory to the Company, you will receive (i)&nbsp;base salary continuation for one (1)&nbsp;year from the date your employment terminates, payable in substantially equal semi-monthly installments; (ii)&nbsp;your earned bonus
(according to the THC plan and performance); and (iii)&nbsp;reimbursement for your cost of COBRA coverage (provided you elect COBRA coverage). </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You acknowledge that in the course of your employment by the Company, you will receive and or be in possession of confidential information of the Company and its parents,
subsidiaries, affiliates and divisions, including, but not limited to, information relating to their financial affairs, business methods, strategic plans, marketing plans, product and styling development plans, pricing, products, vendors, suppliers,
manufacturers, computer programs and software. You agree that you will not, without the prior written consent of the Company, during the period of your employment or thereafter, disclose or make use of any such confidential information, except as
may be required by law or in the course of your employment hereunder. You agree that all tangible materials containing confidential information, whether created by you or others, which shall come into your custody or possession during your
employment, shall be and are the exclusive property of the Company. Upon termination of your employment for any reason whatsoever, you shall immediately surrender to the Company all confidential information and property of the Company in your
possession, custody or control. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You agree that during the one (1)&nbsp;year period immediately following the last day of your employment, you shall not employ or retain (or participate in or arrange for the
employment or retention of) any person who was employed or retained by the Company or any of its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates and divisions within the six-month period immediately preceding such employment or retention.
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You agree that during the term of your employment with and for one (1)&nbsp;year after leaving the employ of the Company for any reason, you will not directly or indirectly, through
any person, firm or corporation, alone or as a member of a partnership or as an officer, director, stockholder, investor, employee or consultant of or in any other corporation or enterprise or otherwise, engage or be engaged in, or assist any other
person, firm, corporation or enterprise in engaging or being engaged in, the wholesale distribution, licensing or outlet retailing of better designer apparel (consisting of men&#146;s and women&#146;s sportswear, jeanswear and/or children&#146;s
wear), accessories, footwear, fragrance and/or home furnishings in any geographic area in which THC or any of its subsidiaries, divisions, or affiliates is actively conducting such business both during your term of employment with the Company and at
the time you engage in such conduct; provided, however, that if the Company elects to enforce this provision, and you are not receiving separation pay as described above, the Company shall pay you during the one-year period (in accordance with the
Company&#146;s then current payroll practices) at the rate of your annual base salary as of the date of your termination. If the Company, at its sole option, decides not to continue your base salary at any time during the one-year period and you are
not otherwise receiving separation pay as described above, this non-competition provision shall not thereafter be enforceable. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You will be responsible for all federal, state and local taxes attributable to the compensation and benefits set forth above. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">You represent that you are not subject to any restriction or limitation which would prevent
you from working for the Company. This agreement between you and the Company contains all of the material terms and conditions governing your employment with the Company and shall supersede all prior agreements between you and the Company. No
amendments to this agreement shall be effective unless agreed to in writing by the Company and you. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York applicable to agreements made and to be performed in that state without regard
to its conflict of laws provisions. You understand that your employment will be &#147;at will&#148; and that no employment contract exists between you and the Company for any specific term of employment and, either you or the Company can terminate
your employment at any time. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">To indicate your acceptance, please sign this letter below and return it to me by March&nbsp;31, 2004. If you should have
any questions, please do not hesitate to call me. I look forward to working with you again. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TYPE>EX-10.31
<SEQUENCE>5
<FILENAME>dex1031.htm
<DESCRIPTION>RESTATED FIRST AMENDMENT AND WAIVER OF THE CREDIT AGREEMENT
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Restated First Amendment and Waiver of the Credit Agreement</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 10.31 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">EXECUTION COPY </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">RESTATED FIRST AMENDMENT AND WAIVER, dated as of February&nbsp;1, 2005 (this &#147;<U>Restated Amendment and Waiver</U>&#148;), to the Credit Agreement,
dated as of June&nbsp;28, 2002 (as the same may further be amended, supplemented or otherwise modified from time to time, the &#147;<U>Credit Agreement</U>&#148;), among Tommy Hilfiger Corporation, a British Virgin Islands corporation
(&#147;<U>Holdings</U>&#148;), Tommy Hilfiger U.S.A., Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#147;<U>Borrower</U>&#148;), the several banks and other financial institutions or entities from time to time parties thereto (collectively, the
&#147;<U>Lenders</U>&#148;; individually, a &#147;<U>Lender</U>&#148;), and JPMorgan Chase Bank, as administrative agent for the Lenders (in such capacity, the &#147;<U>Administrative Agent</U>&#148;). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>W</U> <U>I</U> <U>T</U> <U>N</U> <U>E</U> <U>S</U> <U>S</U> <U>E</U>
<U>T</U> <U>H</U> : </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Borrower, the Lenders and the
Administrative Agent are parties to the Credit Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Borrower, the Administrative Agent and the Lenders party thereto entered into a First Amendment and Waiver, dated as of November&nbsp;16, 2004 (the &#147;<U>Existing First Amendment</U>&#148;), to the Credit Agreement;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Borrower has requested that the Lenders restate
the Existing First Amendment in its entirety as set forth herein; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">WHEREAS, the Administrative Agent and the Lenders party hereto are willing to so restate the Existing First Amendment on the terms and conditions provided for herein; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises contained herein, the parties hereto agree that the Existing First
Amendment is hereby restated in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1.
<U>Defined Terms</U>. Unless otherwise defined herein, terms which are defined in the Credit Agreement and used herein (and in the recitals hereto) as defined terms are so used as so defined. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2. <U>Amendments to Section&nbsp;1.1 (Definitions)</U>. Section&nbsp;1.1 of
the Credit Agreement is hereby amended as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(a) by adding a new proviso to the end of the definition of &#147;Available Basket&#148; as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, during the period from the First Amendment and
Waiver Effective Date until the Borrower and its Subsidiaries and Holdings and the Holdings Subsidiaries are in compliance with Sections 6.1(b), 6.2(c) and 6.2(d) (other than any requirement that any report, certificate or other item be delivered
within 45 days after the end of the fiscal quarters ended September&nbsp;30, 2004 and December&nbsp;31, 2004) and Section&nbsp;6.2(b), the Available Basket may only be used for acquisition investments pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.7(g), and the
aggregate acquisition investments made pursuant to 7.7(f) and (g)&nbsp;during such period may not exceed $50,000,000 unless otherwise agreed by the Required Lenders (<U>provided</U>, that such acquisition investments shall not be made in or with any
Unrestricted Subsidiary); <U>provided</U>, that any such acquisition investments shall not be made in or with any Unrestricted Subsidiary and <U>provided</U>, <U>further</U>, that any such Investments made prior to the First Amendment and Waiver
Effective Date shall not be so limited.&#148; </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) by adding thereto the following definitions in the appropriate alphabetical order:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Adjusted Current Assets</U>&#148;: any and all cash,
Cash Equivalents, accounts receivable and inventory of Holdings and the Holdings Subsidiaries. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Adjusted Current Liabilities</U>&#148;: all current liabilities of Holdings and the Holdings Subsidiaries determined on a consolidated basis in
accordance with GAAP, all outstanding Indebtedness under the Senior Note Indenture and all outstanding Obligations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>First Amendment and Waiver Effective Date</U>&#148;: November&nbsp;15, 2004. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Liquidity</U>&#148;: Adjusted Current Assets minus Adjusted Current Liabilities. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3. <U>Amendment to Section&nbsp;7.7(j)</U>. Section&nbsp;7.7(j) of the Credit
Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new proviso to the end thereof as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Agreement, no Investments may be made pursuant to this paragraph (j)&nbsp;during the period from the First Amendment and
Waiver Effective Date until the Borrower and its Subsidiaries and Holdings and the Holdings Subsidiaries are in compliance with Sections 6.1(b), 6.2(c) and 6.2(d) (other than any requirement that any report, certificate or other item be delivered
within 45 days after the end of the fiscal quarters ended September&nbsp;30, 2004 and December&nbsp;31, 2004) and Section&nbsp;6.2(b)&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4. <U>Waiver of Section&nbsp;8(d)</U>. The Lenders hereby waive compliance with Section&nbsp;8(d) of the Credit Agreement until March&nbsp;15, 2005 solely
to the extent that a Default or Event of Default is caused by the failure of Holdings and the Borrower to comply with the requirements of Section&nbsp;6.1(b) of the Credit Agreement with respect to the fiscal quarters of Holdings ended
September&nbsp;30, 2004 and December&nbsp;31, 2004. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5.
<U>Waiver of Section&nbsp;8(e)</U>. The Lenders hereby waive compliance, until March&nbsp;15, 2005, by Holdings and any of its Subsidiaries with Section&nbsp;8(e)(iii) of the Credit Agreement solely with respect to Section&nbsp;704 of the Senior
Note Indenture, <U>provided</U>, that such waiver shall automatically expire if any Indebtedness under the Senior Note Indenture is declared due and payable as a result of any failure to comply with said Section&nbsp;704. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6. <U>Amendment to Section&nbsp;6.2</U>. Section&nbsp;6.2 of the Credit
Agreement is hereby amended by: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) inserting
at the end of paragraph (b)&nbsp;the following new proviso: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">&#147;<U>provided</U>, that, during the period from the First Amendment and Waiver Effective Date until March&nbsp;15, 2005, each of Holdings and the Borrower shall comply with this paragraph (b)&nbsp;to the extent information is available
as limited solely by the failure to comply with Section&nbsp;6.1(b);&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) inserting at the end of paragraph (c)&nbsp;the following new proviso: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>provided</U>, that, during the period from the First Amendment and Waiver Effective Date until March&nbsp;15, 2005, each of Holdings and the
Borrower shall comply with this paragraph (c)&nbsp;to the extent information is available as limited solely by the failure to comply with Section&nbsp;6.1(b);&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(c) inserting at the end of paragraph (d)&nbsp;the following new proviso: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>provided</U>, that, during the period from the First Amendment and
Waiver Effective Date until March&nbsp;15, 2005, each of Holdings and the Borrower shall comply with this paragraph (d)&nbsp;to the extent information is available as limited solely by the failure to comply with Section&nbsp;6.1(b);&#148;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7. <U>Amendment of Section&nbsp;7.1 (Financial Condition
Covenants)</U>. Section&nbsp;7.1 of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by inserting the following new paragraph (d)&nbsp;immediately following paragraph (c): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;(d) Permit Liquidity at any time to be less than $1.00, during the period from the First Amendment and Waiver
Effective Date until the Borrower and its Subsidiaries and Holdings and the Holdings Subsidiaries are in compliance with&nbsp;Section&nbsp;6.1(b) of this Agreement (other than any requirement that any report, certificate or other item be delivered
within 45 days after the end of the fiscal quarters ended September&nbsp;30, 2004 and December&nbsp;31, 2004). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8. <U>Representations and Warranties</U>. On and as of the date hereof after giving effect hereto, Holdings and the Borrower hereby confirm, reaffirm and
restate the representations and warranties set forth in Section&nbsp;4 of the Credit Agreement, except to the extent that such representations and warranties expressly relate to a specific earlier date in which case Holdings and the Borrower hereby
confirm, reaffirm and restate such representations and warranties as of such earlier date. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9. <U>Conditions to Effectiveness</U>. This Restated Amendment and Waiver shall become effective as of the date hereof upon receipt by the Administrative Agent of counterparts to this Restated Amendment and Waiver
duly executed by Holdings, the Borrower and the Required Lenders. Nothing herein shall limit the full force and effect of the Existing First Amendment for the period from the First Amendment and Waiver Effective Date to the effective date of this
Restated Amendment and Waiver. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">10. <U>Continuing Effect; No
Other Waivers</U>. Except as expressly provided herein, all of the terms and provisions of the Credit Agreement are and shall remain in full force and effect. The waiver provided for herein is limited to the specific sections of the Credit Agreement
specified herein and shall not constitute a consent, waiver or amendment of, or an indication of the Administrative Agent&#146;s or the Lenders&#146; willingness to consent to any action requiring consent under or to waive or amend, any other
provisions of the Credit Agreement or the same sections for any other date or time period (whether or not such other provisions or compliance with such sections for another date or time period are affected by the circumstances addressed in this
Restated Amendment and Waiver). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11. <U>Expenses</U>. Holdings
and the Borrower agree to pay and reimburse the Administrative Agent for all its reasonable costs and out-of-pocket expenses incurred in connection with the preparation and delivery of this Restated Amendment and Waiver, including, without
limitation, the reasonable fees and disbursements of counsel to the Administrative Agent. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">12. <U>Counterparts</U>. This Restated Amendment and Waiver may be executed in any number of counterparts by the parties hereto (including by facsimile transmission), each of which counterparts when so executed shall
be an original, but all the counterparts shall together constitute one and the same instrument. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">13. <U>GOVERNING LAW</U>. THIS RESTATED AMENDMENT AND WAIVER SHALL BE GOVERNED BY, AND CONSTRUED AND INTERPRETED IN ACCORDANCE WITH, THE LAWS OF THE STATE
OF NEW YORK. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties hereto have caused this Restated Amendment and Waiver to be executed and
delivered by their respective duly authorized officers as of the date first above written. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><DIV ALIGN="right">
